name: Mantari
description:
Dive deep and explore the neon reef with the latest Mantari underwater ship model. Collect sea urchins and watch out for local hostiles.

Controlls

W A S D - Move the ship around the 
Left Mouse Button - Fires plasma gun to take out enemies
Right Mouse Button - Fires rockets for extra damage
R - Reload the plasma gun

Team: Robyn the Conqueror

Team lead- Auguste (up2015821)
Lead programmer- George Kruger (up2015312)
Programmer - Bryce Reading (up2007484)
Level design - Auguste (up2015821), FernandoSS (up2004523)
Technical art - FernandoSS (up2004523)
Concept art - Auguste (up2015821)
3D Art - Phillip Weaver (up2013579), Andy (up951509), Samuel Audu(up2039855)

Trailer - Samuel Audu(up2039855)
